medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient presents with one day of abdominal pain that started after the ERCP today, associated with nausea and vomiting. Initially went home but returned to the hospital due to severe mid-abdominal pain, not relieved with home pain medications. Pain has no radiation to back.
medical_history.family_history: Father suffers from multiple sclerosis; paternal grandfather suffered from pancreatic cancer; maternal grandmother suffered from lung cancer. No history of liver disease, hematologic abnormalities, or anemia.
